utils module¶

utils.int_to_datetime(time)[source]¶
Parameters:data – timestamp to parse time object.

parse integer timestamp to Date instance.

utils.time_to_json(data)[source]¶
Parameters:data – time data to parse.

formats the time fields in order the parse to json.
